actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to declare that certain federally owned land is held by the United States in trust for the Kiowa, Comanche, and Apache Indian Tribes of Oklahoma.

summary.text: Declares that specified federally owned land of approximately 791.8 acres to be held in trust by the United States for the Kiowa, Comanche, and Apache Indian Tribes of Oklahoma upon payment therefor in the amount of $71,733.

titles.title: A bill to declare that certain federally owned land is held by the United States in trust for the Kiowa, Comanche, and Apache Indian Tribes of Oklahoma.
